page.title: 10The Twinning Celebrations.
page.content: On the first afternoon of arrival the party of visitors from{Pluguffan (our {twin town)}hosts and friends recieved a{welsh tea of welcome}at the Church Hall.Tea included homemade Welsh cakes, Bara Brith and other cakes and pasties. Afterwards everyone proceeded to a{Tree Planting Ceremony}(an apple tree) in the Cottage Hospital Grounds. On the Friday morning councillors and their wives were invited to attend a{Civic Reception on behalf of Dinefwr at the{Mayoral Parlour Llandeilo.}A {picnic}for everyone was held on the College fields in the afternoon. A {"Sgubor Lawen"}was held where guests and friends enjoyed an evening of traditional{Welsh singing and folk {dancing.
